extra.render_script: <script>const SIZE=32,HALF_SIZE=16,ONE=1,SPACE=0,schema=[1,2,3,4,5];function generate(){let n=[],t=SEED,e=0,s=0,i=0,a=0,o=t%11+5;for(let r=0;r<32;r+=1){s=2*(r-16)+1,t%3==1?s=-s:t%3==2&&(s=Math.abs(s)),s*=t;for(let r=0;r<32;r+=1)e=2*(r-16)+1,t%2==1&&(e=Math.abs(e)),e*=t,i=Math.abs(e*s/1)%o,a=i<5?schema[i]:0,n.push(a)}return JSON.stringify({instructions:n})}function randomNumber(n,t){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(t-n+1)+n)}const colors=['#101010','#D7D7D7','#EF8509','#3C38ED','#378958','#EDB4EE'];let params=JSON.parse(generate());const instructions=params.instructions;let c='';const designDimension=window.innerHeight,canvasStep=[designDimension/32,designDimension/32],canvasTextSize=designDimension/54.4,canvasStart=[0,0];function setup(){const n=min(window.innerWidth,window.innerHeight);if(createCanvas(n,n),background(0),noLoop(),instructions.length>0){textSize(canvasTextSize);for(let n=0;n<32;n+=1)for(let t=0;t<32;t+=1){c=instructions[t+32*n];let e=color(colors[c]);fill(e),noStroke(),square(canvasStart[0]+t*canvasStep[0],canvasStart[1]+n*canvasStep[1],designDimension/32)}}}</script>
